ygData.subject: Hacks, Cheats and Unlimited Plat!
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been looking at a lot of guides that claim to help you hack or cheat at Everquest.  While each one is a little different they all have some things in
ygData.messageBody:
I have been looking at a lot of guides that claim to help you hack or cheat
at Everquest. While each one is a little different they all have some
things in common. They claim there is an e-mail address that was set up by
Sony then forgotten about. If you send an e-mail to this address with
certain codes in it you can modify your character. The messages go into a
lot of detail listing all the codes, what they do, and how to use them. In
order to make sure the cheat works on your character you need to include
your Station username and password in the e-mail. I should not have to say
any more but just in case you don't get it, whoever runs the e-mail address
is sure not Sony, its a loser who wants to steal your account. Never e-mail
your password to anyone!

The Plat guides I have looked at are all way out of date. None of them have
mentioned POK or how the Bazzar has made many of the methods they describe
obsolete. They also claim you can make 100plat or more an hour with a level
1 character, what they don't say is that you first need to spend a number of
hours maxing out that characters trade skills and that your char will need
some plat in advance to pull it off. I really did not see anything that I
did not already know from reading EQtraders or other websites.

I also found a secret way to get into EQII beta! Just send you username and
password to this secret e-mail address...
